mapper.sql:
t_house_property_building_unit.id, t_house_property_building_unit.building_id AS buildingId, t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id AS designModelId, t_house_property_building_unit.unit_code AS unitCode, t_house_property_building_unit.direction AS direction, t_house_property_building_unit.unit_number AS unitNumber, t_house_property_building_unit.x_axis AS xAxis, t_house_property_building_unit.y_axis AS yAxis, t_house_property_building_unit.area as area, t_house_property_building_unit.real_area as realArea, t_house_property_building_unit.multi_area as multiArea, t_house_property_building_unit.multi_real_area as multiRealArea,
t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_property_building_unit.* FROM t_house_property_building_unit WHERE t_house_property_building_unit.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.id

SELECT t_house_property_building_unit.*
, t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType
, t_house_property_community.community AS communityName , t_house_property_building.`code` As buildingCode
FROM t_house_property_building_unit
JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id = t_house_design_model.id
JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id = t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_building.community_id = t_house_property_community.id
WHERE t_house_property_building_unit.id = #{entity.id} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.id

SELECT t_house_property_building_unit.*,t_house_design_model.area AS area,t_house_design_model.vr_link AS vrLink,t_house_design_model.vr_picture AS vrPicture FROM t_house_property_building_unit JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id=t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id LEFT JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_design_model.id = t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id LEFT JOIN t_house_vr_picture ON t_house_vr_picture.id = t_house_design_model.vr_id WHERE t_house_property_community.id=1
